elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Indicate below whether the question or its processing is a project or not, and briefly justify your answer.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Creation of the shift work plan in the production department.
elements.correctAnswer: No, there is no project. Routine work, always recurring.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Company-wide introduction of the Kool software on 1.1.202X.
elements.correctAnswer: Yes, there is a project: unique, complex, different departments involved, extensive employee training required, exact completion date ...

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Preparation for the team leader meeting next Monday.
elements.correctAnswer: No, there is no project. Routine work, always recurring.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Preparation of the annual financial statements as at March 1.
elements.correctAnswer: No, there is no project. Routine work, always recurring.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Indicate below whether the question or its processing is a project or not, and briefly justify your answer.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Development of a new report form in which the monthly sales activities can be summarized.
elements.correctAnswer: Yes, it is a (smaller) project: interdisciplinary, innovative, relatively complex, clear end date.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Building a house
elements.correctAnswer: Yes, there is a project: rather unique, complex, interdisciplinary, clear start and end dates for private individuals.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Preparation of a romantic dinner for the 3rd anniversary.
elements.correctAnswer: There may be a project: clear deadline (end date), relatively unique, possibly complex ... It depends on the exact circumstances.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Relocation of the bed tower of a cantonal hospital from the old building to the new building on September 15.
elements.correctAnswer: Yes, it is a project: highly complex, clear target date, clear objectives, highly interdisciplinary.
